venue.name: Charles River Museum of Industry and Innovation

item.description:
The Charles River Museum of Industry is hosting The New England Steam Punk Festival [.pdf]



From the flyer:
Jules Verne meets modern technology during a daylong festival at the Charles River Museum of Industry & Innova- tion in Waltham. Enjoy hands on activities, interactive exhib- its, vendors, live music and more at this event celebrating everything steampunk!

Admission is $6 for adults and $4 for kids.

And the Charles River Museum of Industry is always interesting to visit too. Displays include Waltham Watch Company Watches and watch making tools, early computer technology, vehicles, machines and more.

To find me, I'll be at/near the intersection of the paths shown below at 11:00.


Once we're all steampunked out, if people are interested, Margaritas is across the street and they have, unsurprisingly, good Margaritas and mexican food.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the spot shown on the map at 11:00, will be carrying a blue messenger/camera bag and have a small blue LED scrolling sign
item.name: New England Steampunk Festival @ Charles River Museum of Industry
